title: Bach - Goldberg Vars (Piano)(Hyperion/Nikolayeva)[FLAC][twistle]
description:
Johann Sebastian Bach (1685 - 1750) <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bach" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bach</a>

Goldberg variations <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goldberg_variations" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goldberg_variations</a>


This is a Hyperion label release of a 1992 studio recording by Tatiana Nikolayeva (Piano)

Everyone remotely keen on keyboard or baroque music should own a copy of these variations.  This performance is accessible, simple, and soft, and is my favourite out of of the several recordings I own of this marvellous work.  I would definitely place it ahead of the Gould versions, which for some unknown reason seem to be everywhere.

EAC FLAC

__


JS Bach - Goldberg Variations (Hyperion)
Tatiana Nikolayeva (Piano)

01 : Aria
02 to 31 : Variations
32 : Aria da capo

Tracks: 32
Total time: 79:11
Year: 1992
